cab.content: '3 EC RE T,BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 26th OCTOBER, 1918.WESTERN FRONTcBritish Front,South of VALENCIENNES a local operation this morningenabled us to advanoe our line slightly to the west ofAULNOY, About 150 prisoners were taken in this operationsFrenoh Front0Thore is no change in tho situation,BALKAN AND PALESTINE FRONTS,There is nothing to reportsITALIAN FRONTjOn the 10th Array front thore is no change, In additionto the prisoners enumerated, 29 guns have been captured,including 6 9" howitzers taken by the British.The 8th Army has reached the line FaLZE DI PIAVE(exclusive), SERNAGLIA, MORIAGO, MQSNIGO, VIDOR (inclusive).A French Division in the 12th Army has established asmall bridge-head at SAN VTTO, north of PEDEROBBAbGeneral Staff,War Office, S,W01,28th October, 1918.Issued at 6C30 p0m, ,
